[http://www.imtech.res.in/mtcc/ MTCC] 4993 }}

'Pseudomonas meridiana' is a psychrophilic, Gram-negative, motile with a polar
flagellum, rod-shaped bacterium isolated from cyanobacterial mats in
Antarctica.
